article: I used to walk my dog every morning. Later when we got back home, I would give it some food. This usually caught the _ of a mynah bird . The most _ feature of this bird was its brightly-coloured _ mouth, so I found it a bit strange. Ks5u  Later I read a book and found that the colour yellow stands for "communication, optimism and inspiration ". I took the "c" from _ , "o" from optimism, and "in" from inspiration to form the word "Coin". This became the bird's _ .  Every time when my dog finished his _ , Coin would look at me and sing , "Raack! Raack!" After singing, she would start picking up the food left by the dog.  When winter came, Coin _ . It was the longest winter that we had ever had. When spring _ came, it was the time for the birds to fly back and I often _  what had happened to Coin.  One day after I had given my _ its food , a mynah flew down. It was then that I heard the _ "Raack! Raack!" Coin was back! Sometimes, I wondered how Coin knew to come back to the same _ she had left.  Each morning Coin would come with her sweet _ . Both I and my dog accepted her as a member of our family. Now, I understand that if we have optimism and inspiration in our life, and if we communicate often with others, we are sure to be _ by everyone.
